english.segment1: I'm here. You've got me. Have no fear. Savior that's me. On a stable rock I'll place you. You can rest. That I will personally will see to
english.segment2: You called out my name. I heard you. You're healed
english.segment3: What happens now?. You're healed. But still I'm disappearing somehow. In your cry I'll always be near. But in your laughter I don't disappear. I'll gladly wipe away your tears. But I'll never become your teddybear
english.segment4: Don't throw this away. I'm no teddybear
english.segment5: I'm here. You've got me. Have no fear. Savior that's me. No favors that's no what I came for. If you had any idea what I've got in store
english.segment6: You called out my name. I heard you. You say I'm feeling fine. You say no deal. But I'll always be two steps behind. In case you change your mind. In your cry I'll always be near. But in your laughter I don't disappear. I'll gladly wipe away your tear. But I'll never become your teddybear
english.segment7: Think through whatever you decide to do. Can't make you but I ask you please don't fake. When you come before me. I know you don't like when you don't see me with your physical eyes. But I tell you what you think you see can be lies
